column4: hi all, please help me, I am using 11.04, yesterday i forcefully shutdown ubuntu, when i rebooterd, then grub shows the option for windows and ubuntu , when i select ubuntu a cursor blinks for 10 seconds and then a black screen turns up
ctrl alt f1
yes i tried but i didnt work
ctrl alt f2?
ctrl alt f2 also not working, i tried f3 f4 ... f12  :(
boot to terminal/recovery

how do i boot to terminal/recovery ? u mean to select the ubuntu(recovery option) ? ,  selected ubuntu recovery option , it now shows some text instead of a blinking cursor, but again black screen comes
uh so you're at a black screen..again?
yes
can you boot to whatever ubuntu's equivalent to init 1 is?
hi, i have booted through live cd, i am able to access the filesystem of my ubuntu instalation (thanks all the data is still there),  how could i recover on from here ?
you chownd or chmodded /usr (which?)
I essentially did nothing but only boot4ed through live cd, and my older ubuntu installation is visible under my computer (through GUI) , I ddnt chownd or chmoded /usr
so why are you in a livecd again?
becuase without live cd, it showed a balck screen on booting, so i booted through live cd, but when i remove live cd, it again shows black screen on booting
oh yeah you were the one without a valid boot up at all...ok
anything in the log files of your install?
how to recover from here ? , dr_willis, asked to edit grub ommands from quiet spalsh to nomodeset, after that, it shows some text but not booting yet, still hung up
what's hte error in the text

Loading please wait, Begin: Loading essential drivers....done, Begn: Running /  scripts/init-premount ...done , .......Begin: Running /scripts/init-bottom ... done,  it shows this, no error as such , but it is hanged up at this point

theadmin: , Loading please wait, Begin: Loading essential drivers....done, Begn: Running /  scripts/init-premount ...done , .......Begin: Running /scripts/init-bottom ... done,  it shows this, no error as such , but it is hanged up at this point
what's in /scripts/init-bottom?
